channel.title: Help Please
channel.description: Can someone put a keylogger in a .bat file? I am not asking how to do it.. I am asking this because someone sent me a .bat file and I opened it and he just said something random. and it was close to my password. Please someone answer quick.

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @gangsta_tony gangsta tony
item.description:
@gangsta_tony wrote:

[quote=“supra s, post:4, topic:345650”][quote author=gangsta tony link=topic=442036.msg3246568#msg3246568 date=1277415136]

NEVER CLICK on a .bat file without looking what the code looks like if u think its to strange ask on a forum what they think about it.

it is possible he used it to gain info from you

probably
this was inside the .bat file

for /l %%n in (1,1,150) do echo no clients reached! >> zynna com%%n.txt del %0
[/quote]

lame joke no worries[/quote]
what do u mean?

Read full topic

@gangsta_tony wrote:

Can someone put a keylogger in a .bat file? I am not asking how to do it… I am asking this because someone sent me a .bat file and I opened it and he just said something random. and it was close to my password. Please someone answer quick.
